languages.text: {n}Жилистый старик с почтением склоняет голову:{/n} "Благословение Двуглавого Бога-орла постигло Кетца Темер с вашим прибытием, о Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}! Этот слуга небес, земли и тех, кто между, давно узрел во снах сей разговор. Этот слуга надеется, что Ведущая-вперед и ее племя приняли посланни{mf|ка|цу} далеких звезд с истинным почтением".

traits.locale_text: {n}Жилистый старик с почтением склоняет голову:{/n} "Благословение Двуглавого Бога-орла постигло Кетца-аль Хет с вашим прибытием, о Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}! Этот слуга небес, земли и тех, кто между, давно узрел во снах сей разговор. Этот слуга надеется, что Ведущая-вперед и ее племя приняли посланни{mf|ка|цу} далеких звезд с истинным почтением".

languages.text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that Leads-Ahead and her tribe welcomed the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars with utmost reverence."
languages.original_text: {n}Жилистый старик с почтением склоняет голову:{/n} "Благословение Двуглавого Бога-орла постигло Кетца Темер с вашим прибытием, о Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}! Этот слуга небес, земли и тех, кто между, давно узрел во снах сей разговор. Этот слуга надеется, что Ведущая-вперед и ее племя приняли посланни{mf|ка|цу} далеких звезд с истинным почтением".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence:{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Twin-Headed Eagle-God had descended upon this world, o Starborn! This servant of the skies, the earth and those in-between had foreseen this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that Leads-Ahead and her tribe had welcomed the Heavenly Envoy of the faraway star with utmost reverence."

This servant of the skies, the earth and those in-between had foreseen this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that Leads-Ahead and her tribe had welcomed the Heavenly Envoy of the faraway star with utmost reverence."

This servant hopes that Leads-Ahead and her tribe had welcomed the Heavenly Envoy of the faraway star with utmost reverence."

This servant hopes that Leads-Ahead and her tribe welcomed the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars with utmost reverence."

This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that Leads-Ahead and her tribe welcomed the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars with utmost reverence."

languages.text: {n}El nervudo anciano inclina la cabeza a modo de reverencia:{/n} «Con tu llegada, la bendición del Dios Águila de Dos Cabezas ha descendido a Quetza Temer, ¡oh {mf|Hijo|Hija} de las Estrellas! Este siervo del cielo, la tierra y todo lo que hay entre ambos había tenido esta conversación en sus sueños hace mucho tiempo. Este siervo alberga la esperanza de que Jefa-de-Todos y su tribu hayan recibido con suma devoción {mf|al Emisario|a la Emisaria} Celestial de las estrellas lejanas».
languages.original_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that Leads-Ahead and her tribe welcomed the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars with utmost reverence."

traits.locale_text: {n}El nervudo anciano inclina la cabeza a modo de reverencia:{/n} «Con tu llegada, la bendición del Dios Águila de Dos Cabezas ha descendido a Quetza Temer, ¡oh {mf|Hijo|Hija} de las Estrellas! Este siervo del cielo, la tierra y todo lo que hay entre ambos había tenido esta conversación en sus sueños hace mucho tiempo. Este siervo alberga la esperanza de que Jefa-de-Todos y su tribu hayan recibido con suma devoción {mf|al Emisario|a la Emisaria} Celestial de las estrellas lejanas».

languages.text: {n}这位身材结实的老人恭敬地低下了头。{/n}“噢，星裔，双头鹰神的祝福随您而来，一同降临在格扎尔特默！这位天空、大地与万物的仆人很久以前就在梦中预见到了此刻的谈话。此仆人希望，‘先导’与她的部落以最大的敬意欢迎了来自遥远群星的圣使。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that Leads-Ahead and her tribe welcomed the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars with utmost reverence."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位身材结实的老人恭敬地低下了头。{/n}“噢，星裔，双头鹰神的祝福随您而来，一同降临在格扎尔特默！这位天空、大地与万物的仆人很久以前就在梦中预见到了此刻的谈话。此仆人希望，‘先导’与她的部落以最大的敬意欢迎了来自遥远群星的天使。”

languages.text: {n}Le vieillard au corps noueux incline respectueusement la tête.{/n} « Par votre venue, c'est l'Aigle-Dieu à deux têtes qui descend sur Quetza Temer, ô Stellaire ! Ce serviteur des cieux, de la terre et de ce qu'il y a entre les deux a vu cette conversation en rêve il y a bien longtemps. Il espère que Mène-la-Marche et sa tribu ont accueilli l'émissaire céleste des étoiles lointaines avec la plus grande déférence. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that Leads-Ahead and her tribe welcomed the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars with utmost reverence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme au corps noueux incline respectueusement la tête.{/n} « Par votre venue, c'est l'Aigle-Dieu à deux têtes qui descend sur Quetza Temer, ô Stellaire ! Ce serviteur des cieux, de la terre et de ce qu'il y a entre les deux a vu cette conversation en rêve il y a bien longtemps. Il espère que Mène-la-Marche et sa tribu ont accueilli l'émissaire céleste des étoiles lointaines avec la plus grande déférence. »

languages.text: {n}筋骨たくましい老人が敬虔な面持ちで頭を下げる。{/n}「あなたの到着により、双頭の鷲神の祝福がケツァ・テメルに降り注いだ！空と大地、そしてその間にいる者たちのしもべは、はるか昔、夢の中でこの会話を予見していた。このしもべは、先導者とその一族が、遥か彼方の星の天の先駆者を最大限の敬意をもって迎えることを望んでいる」
languages.original_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that Leads-Ahead and her tribe welcomed the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars with utmost reverence."

traits.locale_text: {n}筋骨たくましい老人が敬虔な面持ちで頭を下げる。{/n}「あなたの到着により、双頭の鷲神の祝福がケツァ・テメルに降り注いだ！空と大地、そしてその間にいる者たちのしもべは、はるか昔、夢の中でこの会話を予見していた。このしもべは、先導者とその一族が、遥か彼方の星の天の先駆者を最大限の敬意をもって迎えることを望んでいる」

languages.text: {n}Der drahtige alte Mann neigt ehrfürchtig den Kopf.{/n} "Mit Eurer Ankunft ist der Segen des zweiköpfigen Adler-Gottes auf Quetza Temer herniedergegangen, o {mf|Sternengeborener|Sternengeborene}! Dieser Diener der Himmel, der Erde und aller Reiche dazwischen hat diese Unterhaltung vor langer Zeit in seinen Träumen vorhergesehen. Dieser Diener hofft, dass Geht-voran und ihr Stamm den Himmel-Herold der fernen Sterne mit äußerster Ehrerbietung begrüßt haben."
languages.original_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that Leads-Ahead and her tribe welcomed the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars with utmost reverence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der drahtige alte Mann neigt ehrfürchtig den Kopf:{/n} "Mit Eurer Ankunft ist der Segen des zweiköpfigen Adler-Gottes auf Quetza Temer herniedergegangen, o {mf|Sternengeborener|Sternengeborene}! Dieser Diener der Himmel, der Erde und aller Reiche dazwischen hat diese Unterhaltung vor langer Zeit in seinen Träumen vorhergesehen. Dieser Diener hofft, dass Geht-voran und ihr Stamm {mf|den himmlischen Gesandten|die himmlische Gesandte} des fernen Sterns mit äußerster Ehrerbietung begrüßt haben."

languages.text: {n}Kuvvetli ihtiyar adam, saygıyla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Gelişinle birlikte Çift Başlı Kartal Tanrı'nın lütfu, Quetza Temer'i fethetti ey Yıldızdoğan! Göklerin, toprağın ve arada kalan her şeyin bu hizmetkârı, sohbetimizi uzun vakitler evvel rüyalarında öngördü. Bu hizmetkâr, Yol Açan ile kabilesinin uzaklardaki yıldızların Gök Müjdecisi'ne büyük bir saygıyla kucak açmasını umuyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that Leads-Ahead and her tribe welcomed the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars with utmost reverence."
